question:
You took your family to a nearby restaurant. You were disappointed with the meal and wish to complain to the manager.
Write a letter to the manager of the restaurant. In your letter,

  » explain why you were at the restaurant
  » describe the problems
  » write about the action you want the manager to take 
Write atleast 150words
text: I am writing to express my dissatisfaction towards the unpalatable meal my family and I were served when we visited your restaurant (People’s Delight) located at Number 8 Kofo Abayomi street Lagos, yesterday the 8th of June 2019.

We were just issued our Canadian Visas despite all the challenges people faced to acquire it, so it called for celebration and lunch in a reputable restaurant,with my husband and three children was most ideal .

My children preferred to have rice and plantain while my husband and I had porridge beans. The rice was too salted that my daughter whose love for rice is out of this world had to reject the meal at the first spoon she took. The beans had lots of stones in it as I even bled on my tongue due to this. We all came with an empty stomach to fill it up with food at your restaurant.

I would have asked for a refund but taking my present suggestion and implementing it , is enough for me. In order avoid losing your customers, it is important you send all your cooks to a reputable catering school to learn the rudiments of cooking and avoid leaving a bad taste and feeling of your eatery to clients.
Hoping to seeing drastic actions being taken to avert further occurrences.
